algorithms

Class SubPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.SubPlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntComparable<SubPlan>

    public class SubPlan
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntComparable<SubPlan>
    The class is used as a node in the planning algorithms.

    Created by Daniel Riissanen on 2.4.2018.

        Class constructor initializing variables.
        Parameters:
        state - The current state
        goal - The goal
        actions - The list of actions
        requirements - A list of preconditions for each action
        effects - A list of postconditions, one for each action
        cost - The cost

        Specified by:
